title: ACT Access Requirement
description: JSON schema for 'Access Control Team' controlled Access Requirement, a 'tier 3' Access Requirement

actContactInfo.description: Information on how to contact the Synapse ACT for access approval (external to Synapse).  Required when creating or updating.
actContactInfo.title: ACT Contact Information

openJiraIssue.description: If true, then in addition to following directions in the 'actContactInfo' the client should open a JIRA issue to notify the ACT.  If omitted, default is 'true'.

isCertifiedUserRequired.description: If true, then accessor needs to be a Synapse Certified User to gain access to the data.

isValidatedProfileRequired.description: If true, then accessor needs to have their Synapse Profile validated to gain access to the data.

isDUCRequired.description: If true, then accessor needs to fill, sign, and submit a DUC to gain access to the data.

ducTemplateFileHandleId.description: If the DUC is required, creator of this requirement needs to upload a DUC template. Users have to download this DUC template, fill out, sign and submit it.

isIRBRequired.description: If true, then accessor needs to submit an IRB to gain access to the data.

areOtherAttachmentsRequired.description: If true, then accessor needs to upload attachment(s) other than DUC and IRB to gain access to the data.

isAnnualReviewRequired.description: If true, then accessor needs to provide information about how they used the data annually and if they have any publication related to the data.

isIDUPublic.description: If true, the Intended Data Use Statements submitted to gain access to the data will be presented to public.
